name: VIT Sitemap
author: Vidushi Infotech

sections.description: This plugin is a user-friendly and efficient tool that helps improve the search engine optimization (SEO) of your website. This lightweight plugin allows you to effortlessly create both HTML and XML sitemaps, providing an easy-to-navigate structure for search engine crawlers and enhancing the discoverability of your website’s content.
sections.installation:
1. Upload VIT Sitemap plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the settings for HTML sitemap from plugin menu
  4. Add the shortcode [vit_sitemap_generator] to page for generate HTML Sitemap
  5. You can create the XML sitemap using plugin option menu
sections.faq:
How to use HTML page Shortcode?

To use HTML Sitemap we need to use this shortcode [vit_sitemap_generator]

short_description: The primary purpose of this plugin is to facilitate the creation of HTML and XML sitemaps.
description: This plugin is a user-friendly and efficient tool that helps improve the search engine optimization (SEO) of your website. This lightweight plugin allows you to effortlessly create both HTML and XML sitemaps, providing an easy-to-navigate structure for search engine crawlers and enhancing the discoverability of your website’s content.
